summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Lane Street, from 5th Avenue South to 7th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the construction of concrete and wooden sidewalks and trestles and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8313 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
